content: --कर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} wicked, acting badly. {2} hard to be done or accomplished, arduous, difficult; वक्तुं सुकरं कर्तुं दुष्करं ‘sooner said than done’; <ls>Amaru. 41</ls>; <ls>Mk. 3. 1.</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 55.</ls> (--रं {1} a difficult or painful task or act, a difficulty. {2} atmosphere, ether.
